page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: To be a Catholic we believe that Jesus Christ suffered and died on the cross for us arose again on the third day after his death. We believe he was the son of God; creator of the world. We go to church to celebrate this by singing hymns and eating bread and drinking wine - the body and blood of Our Lord. We follow this religion and spread the good news that God is alive in our hearts. When Christ was alive, Gods son, he performed many miracles and we hear of these in the readings of the mass.We also want to live a Catholic life during our time on earth so we go to confession and ask for forgiveness of our sins.
